data.text: Inu Aisraeli, imvani mawu awa amene Yehova wayankhula kutsutsana nanu, kutsutsana ndi banja lonse limene analitulutsa mu Igupto:
Kodi pamene lipenga la nkhondo lalira mu mzinda,
Lengezani zimenezi ku nyumba zaufumu za ku Asidodi
Nʼchifukwa chake Ambuye Yehova akunena izi:
“Imvani izi ndipo mupereke umboni wotsutsa nyumba ya Yakobo,” akutero Ambuye, Yehova Mulungu Wamphamvuzonse.
“Pa tsiku limene ndidzalange Israeli chifukwa cha machimo ake,
